company_name: (遠東集團)鼎鼎企業管理顧問股份有限公司
job_qualification: 「新零售」、「全渠道」、「無人店」等，都是零售通路數位轉型的藍圖；人工智慧、機器學習等，則是提升消費體驗，轉型必備的能力，而提供能力的養分則是零售通路的巨量資料、適切的演算法、及懂得探索數據的人才!  遠東集團零售通路體系現下即將進入新營運模式，亟需結集各式大數據人才，協助提出並發現問題、整集並清洗數據、演算並建構數據模型、調整並優化數據參數、輸出結果並提出結論。 大數據團隊預計徵才六位，由零售通路規劃總部帶領，偕同各通路技術團隊，共同建構遠東集團零售通路客戶導向的資料倉儲、數據模型、商情模板，進而提供具客戶體驗導向的數位應用、及人工智慧服務。 若是您具備以下相關經驗或資格，我們竭誠歡迎您的加入，為遠東集團零售通路注入新血，共同創造下一個世代、屬於台灣市場的數據零售營運模式!    數據分析師: 三年以上消費性商品產業相關之數據分析經驗。統計、應數相關學歷、熟悉至少一種商業智慧工具。熟悉R軟體，具建模經驗者尤佳。主要負責資料探勘、資料分析、資料視覺化；或預測分析、商業決策解讀。(相關徵才細節請參照下列說明) 遠東零售集團官網：https://www.ferg.com.tw/categories.aspx?cid=2&lang=TW 透過收集業務端需求及商業資料，發掘並驗證新的因果/相關與可能解決方案，提供洞見，數據處理、分析與報告。– 與各公司之業務主管溝通– 跨軟體/資料結構及分析/營運發展– 從營運洞察中發掘創新點子– 持續和業務單位成員腦力激盪及互動– 持續發掘尚未蒐集的資料來源及可能性
job_other_qualification:
其他條件：
3 年 以上數據相關分析經驗, 消費性商品產業, 零售,電子商務產業經驗尤佳 基本能力:邏輯思考、分析判斷、溝通能力佳 喜好主動探索事務或思考、學習新知，且學習能力佳 主動細心、正面思考、工作態度積極 具熟悉分群、推薦、預測等演算法理論基礎，並有實作經驗者佳 具研究報告撰寫、簡報能力電腦技能:熟悉資料庫SQL 語法熟悉一商業智慧分析工具： Tableau, OBIEE, Power BI…對大數據(Big data)分析相關研究經驗，熟悉R 軟體語言及應用者尤佳專業技術:具統計學基礎 具Data Mining模型建置實務經驗尤佳 相關零售/電商產業經驗尤佳特殊才能:具熟悉分群、推薦、預測等演算法理論基礎，有實作經驗 大數據分析經驗

company_name: 91APP_九易宇軒股份有限公司
job_name: Data & Insights Analyst 數據洞察分析師
job_qualification: 工作內容：從產品、銷售等層面建構完整的數據分析體系，並通過數據探索、各案分析等應用，提供產品、營運決策有質量的數據支持。 • 數據專案 – 參與產品專案中與數據相關的議題，協助定義數據收集與後續分析需求，規劃並推動數據產品，推動公司朝向數據驅動營運的實現。• 數據模型 – 依據資料演算與分析需求，建構所需要的資料處理流程與數據模型，根據實際業務調整資料模型與 ETL 流程。• 數據工程 – 能善用自動化的方法處理資料，熟悉大量資料處理與分析，使數據分析與應用產品化。• 數據分析 – 主動進行各種數據追蹤和分析，針對商業問題提出數據產出、評估與應用，並持續優化與修正。建立全面、準確的經營管理成效衡量指標，幫助電商洞察經營數據，提供有效的決策支援。

1.熟悉資料庫、資料處理相關技術概念，如：ER-Model, SQL language, Stored Procedure, ETL Process。2.具備資料統計或程式開發等相關技術，R, Python 等程式語言尤佳。3.熟悉分群、推薦、預測等演算法理論基礎，並有實作經驗。4.主動學習、探索新技術、新領域、新方法，並能快速運用於工作中。

job_qualification: 「新零售」、「全渠道」、「無人店」等，都是零售通路數位轉型的藍圖；人工智慧、機器學習等，則是提升消費體驗，轉型必備的能力，而提供能力的養分則是零售通路的巨量資料、適切的演算法、及懂得探索數據的人才! 遠東集團零售通路體系現下即將進入新營運模式，亟需結集各式大數據人才，協助提出並發現問題、整集並清洗數據、演算並建構數據模型、調整並優化數據參數、輸出結果並提出結論。 大數據團隊預計徵才六位，由零售通路規劃總部帶領，偕同各通路技術團隊，共同建構遠東集團零售通路客戶導向的資料倉儲、數據模型、商情模板，進而提供具客戶體驗導向的數位應用、及人工智慧服務。若是您具備以下相關經驗或資格，我們竭誠歡迎您的加入，為遠東集團零售通路注入新血，共同創造下一個世代、屬於台灣市場的數據零售營運模式!遠東零售集團官網：https://www.ferg.com.tw/categories.aspx?cid=2&lang=TW主要任務：協助與業務端需求確認，執行數據處理、資料分析與報告工作。• 數據專案– 參與營運專案中與數據相關的議題，協助定義數據收集與後續分析需求，規劃並推動數據產品，推動公司朝向數據驅動營運的實現。– 針對分析結果與實際需求單位進行簡報、互動與討論。• 數據分析– 運用BI與database工具進行各種數據維度交叉分析，針對商業問題提出數據產出、評估與應用，並持續優化與修正。– 評估運用合適的統計、機器學習建立模型，探勘商業上可能的關聯/因果，更精準掌握趨勢變化。
job_other_qualification:
其他條件：
個人特質： 1. 邏輯思考、分析判斷、溝通能力佳 2. 喜好主動探索事務或思考、學習新知，且學習能力佳 3. 主動細心、正面思考、工作態度積極 其他條件：– 具會員分群、推薦、預測等演算法理論基礎，並有實作經驗者佳– 具研究報告撰寫、簡報能力

company_name: 泰鼎網路安全科技有限公司_Nexusguard Limited
job_qualification: Nexusguard is seeking a data scientist/engineer that will work on projects of DDoS anomaly detection and Internet intrusion detection. Data scientist is expected to be familiar with data mining and machine learning technologies. The primary focus will be in applying machine learning or deep learning techniques to achieve the overall Nexusguard threat intelligence in terms of threat mitigation, prevention, and prediction. And eventually, build a Nexusguard threat bank that can offer the threat analytics internally and externally. Knowledge of internet protocols, statistical analysis, pattern recognition, data mining, information retrieval, natural language processing, and internet security will be very helpful in this position. Key Job Duties & Responsibilities Development and Strategy ● Research and implement the state-of-the-art data mining methods that can fit the need of Nexusguard security business.● Survey the latest deep learning algorithms. ● Utilize and enhance the data collection and extraction procedure.● Build and optimize data training and classification techniques.● Develop automated anomaly detection systems and control the performance
job_other_qualification:
其他條件：
Qualifications / Requirements● Degree in Computer Science or related discipline, or equivalent work experience.● Ability to learn new and emerging technologies.● In depth knowledge of machine learning and deep learning techniques and algorithms, such as k-means, SVM, decision tree, recurrent neural network(RNN), long short term memory(LSTM), gated recurrent unit(GRU), etc.● Development experience using one of JAVA, R, Matlab or python languages.● Development experience with NoSQL databases, such as MongoDB, Cassandra, HBase.● Strong analytical thinking and problem solving skills.● Demonstrated ability to deliver analysis results and solutions.● Great communication skills.● Knowledge of cybersecurity is a plus

company_name: 捷思遊戲科技有限公司
job_qualification: POSITION OVERVIEWGenesis Gaming is seeking an exceptional ETL developer to normalize and cleanse our massive dataset of gaming service, maintenance and repair data into data analytics tools to assists players in the gaming and to support the design and development of BI Solutions. The ETL Developer will work in conjunction with the ETL Architect, ETL developers and BI developers to understand functionality, scalability, performance, security and integration requirements from the ETL perspective, and translate these requirements into infrastructure resource planning and implementation. This person will be focused on the development and maintenance of the AWS Service Suite of products. KEY ACCOUNTABILITY AREAS- Design, develop data transformations using ELT and ETL approach, and modify and test software applications for BI Data models- Provide mappings from proprietary data sets to industry standard data sets to allow data to be shared in common nomenclature- Translate business requirements into detailed data requirements by performing source data profiling and requirement analysis- Become an expert on our datasets working with cross-functional team members of our industry-leading software packages to identify and prioritize actionable, high-impact insights across a variety of core business areas- Responsible for maintenance, configuration, migration and support Information Server environments and its components- Day to Day management of metadata assets including construction / maintenance of data lineage- Metadata repository tool administration, including routine trouble-shooting, user permission roles and security maintenance, performance monitoring and usage monitoring- Document and establish process and ETL technical runbooks for production support
job_other_qualification:
其他條件：
Required Qualifications- Bachelors or equivalent degree in a business, technical, or related field- Demonstrated Strong SQL Server, Hadoop, Data Warehouse, ETL Design and Development Expertise- At least 3 years of experience with Data Warehouse ETL design, development and maintenance with successful implementation of Enterprise BI solutions- Experience in Hadoop data lake (AWS S3/Redshift/EMR) as source for data cleansing and transformation into data warehouse environment is preferred- Strong technical experience in designing and implementing data-intensive Data Warehouse solutions- High proficiency writing SQL- Strong Knowledge of logical and physical data modeling (relational, dimensional data modeling)

company_name: 亞洲遊科技股份有限公司
job_qualification: We are looking for an experienced Data Engineer to help build, scale and maintain the critical data warehouse. The Business Intelligence team, under the Infrastructure unit, is responsible for building and maintaining the state-of-the-art ETL infrastructure that makes this data available and accessible to the entire company to make data driven decisions. The team works closely with Data scientists, Product Managers, Executives to understand their data requirements and build appropriate systems and platform that meet or exceed those needs. The team is committed to being an early adopter and contributor to open source big data technologies. 【Responsibilities】Contributing at a senior-level to the data warehouse design and data preparation by implementing a solid, robust, extensible design that supports key business flows.Performing all of the necessary data transformations to populate data into a warehouse table structure that is optimized for reporting.Providing operational excellence through root cause analysis and continuous improvement for Big Data technologies and processes and contributes back to open source community.Establishing efficient design and programming patterns for engineersDesigning, integrating and documenting technical components for seamless data extraction and analysis on big data platform.Ensuring best practices that can be adopted in Big Data stack and share across teams and BUs. 【Basic Qualification】- BS, MS or PhD in Computer Science or related technical discipline- 2+ years of relevant work experience- Experience with implementing highly scalable systems on top of cloud infrastructures, such as AWS or GCP - Expertise in hands-on ETL job design, components and modules development of data process- Experience with data warehouse best practices in Big Data space- Experience with at least one scripting language  【產品團隊文化】 - 全球運營，服務不僅限台灣使用者，而是面向全世界各地的使用者 - 信任授權，在這做產品沒有階級之分，歡迎任何聲音與意見 - Agile 開發流程，跑 Kanban 不跑 Scrum，哪種跑最快就修正調整流程，不墨守成規- Data Driven 文化，在這我們相信數據是不斷成長的關鍵 - User Centric，在這使用者的反饋最重要

company_name: 捷思遊戲科技有限公司
job_qualification: Summary of role and responsibilitiesAs a Data Scientist you will be a member of the Business Intelligence team, responsible for discovering the information hidden in vast amounts of data, and help us make smarter decisions to deliver even better content. Your primary focus will be in applying data mining techniques, doing statistical analysis, and building high quality prediction systems integrated with our products. In addition to advanced analytic skills, this role is also proficient at integrating and preparing large, varied datasets, architecting specialized database and computing environments, and communicating results. Responsibilities• Designs experiments, test hypotheses, and build models• Conducts advanced data analysis and highly complex designs algorithm.• Applies advanced statistical and predictive modeling techniques to build, maintain, and improve on multiple real-time decision systems.• Employ sophisticated analytics programs, machine learning and statistical methods to prepare data for use in predictive and prescriptive modeling• Selecting features, building and optimizing classifiers using machine learning techniques• Data mining using state-of-the-art methods, such as automate scoring using machine learning techniques, build recommendation systems, improve and extend the features used by our existing classifier, develop internal A/B testing procedures, build system for automated fraud detection• Extending company’s data with third party sources of information when needed• Enhancing data collection procedures to include information that is relevant for building analytic systems• Processing, cleansing, and verifying the integrity of data used for analysis• Creating automated anomaly detection systems and constant tracking of its performance• Conduct undirected research and frame open-ended industry questions• Extract huge volumes of data from multiple internal and external sources• Thoroughly clean and prune data to discard irrelevant information• Devise data-driven solutions to the most pressing challenges• Invent new algorithms to solve problems and build new tools to automate work• Communicate predictions and findings to management and IT departments through effective data visualizations and reports• Being involved in recruitment of new team members
job_other_qualification:
其他條件：
Requirements• Masters in mathematics, statistics or computer science or related field; PHD degree preferred.• Typically requires 5 or more years of relevant quantitative and qualitative research and analytics experience.• Solid knowledge of statistical techniques and machine learning algorithms• Experience with common data science toolkits and statistical packages, such as R, NumPy, MatLab, etc. • The ability to come up with solutions to loosely defined business problems by leveraging pattern detection over potentially large datasets.•• Strong scripting and programming skills (such as Hadoop MapReduce or other big data frameworks, Java), statistical modeling (like SAS or R).• Proficiency in using query languages such as SQL, Hive, Pig• Proficiency in statistical analysis, quantitative analytics, forecasting/predictive analytics, multivariate testing, and optimization algorithms.• Strong communication and interpersonal skills• Experience leading teams• Excellent understanding of machine learning techniques and algorithms, such as k-NN, Naive Bayes, SVM, Decision Forests, etc.• Great communication skills• Experience with data visualization tools, such as Tableau, Splunk, etc.• Experience with NoSQL databases, such as Cassandra, MongoDB • Data-oriented personality

company_name: IBM_台灣國際商業機器股份有限公司
job_qualification: Are you interested in helping companies re-invent themselves and their industries in the digital era? Do you want to leverage your business acumen and understanding of emerging technology to define the vision and strategy for how businesses will remain competitive and grow? Do you have an entrepreneurial and innovative mindset? IBM is recruiting young and talented graduates for IBM’s world-class 2-year development program - Consulting by Degrees Program (CbD). CbD Program is designed by IBM senior experts that aiming to develop future leadership with the opportunity to accelerate consulting career through various client project work across different industries and service areas with focused training, project rotation and mentoring. What the role involves?Data Scientist will work on a variety of research and development projectsleveraging multiple analytical techniques (data mining, text mining, and deep learning ). Scope of projects will include Marketing, Merchandising, Customer Analytics, and Image/Video Recognition. Familiarity with large structured, semi-structured, and unstructured data is a plus. Responsibilities include collaborating with a global Data Science team to develop and implement methodologies; collaborating with solution leaders and engineers to ensure understanding of analytical requirements; ensuring that all algorithms scale and if needed can be executed in real time; engaging with customers to understand their business problems. Your profileWe are looking for entry level candidates from all backgrounds to become full-time Consulting by Degrees consultant, who are keen to demonstrate the following qualities and behaviors:-• Adaptability - How do you cope with changing demands and stress? Are you flexible? Have you successfully completed several projects with competing deadlines?• Communication - Do you present information clearly, precisely and succinctly? Adapt the way you communicate to your audience? And listen to others?• Client Focus - Can you see a situation from a client’s viewpoint, whether that’s colleagues or customers? Can you anticipate their needs?• Creative Problem Solving - Do you use ingenuity, supported by logical methods and analysis, to propose solutions? Can you anticipate problems? Do you put forward innovative ideas?• Drive - Will you proactively learn new skills – even if they’re beyond the scope of your current job? Will you put in the time and energy needed to achieve results?• Teamwork - How do you work with others to achieve shared goals? Do you easily build relationships with others? Are you a team player?• Passion for IBM - Do you know what IBM does and what our most recent achievements are? Are you up to speed with the latest trends in our industry? What are the biggest challenges we face? (You’ll need the facts at your fingertips and the enthusiasm to match.)• Taking Ownership - Do you take responsibility for tasks/decisions? And implement decisions with speed? Can you show when you’ve worked to correct your mistakes?

HLX develops advanced mathematical models and innovative technology solutions to analyze global financial markets. Its founders have extensive experience in the financial industry and advanced degrees in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics from the world's leading universities. We are currently seeking talented, articulate, highly-motivated candidates who will contribute to the design, development, and maintenance of automated trading systems, quantitative research tools, high-performance data management systems, portfolio management tools, and technical architecture/infrastructure.The responsibilities of new hires will span a wide variety of programming, data analysis, statistical and other quantitative projects. These projects often range in duration and programming environment. This position will have a high degree of autonomy as well as responsibility in the design, direction, and approach in these tasks. We believe in a casual and collaborative atmosphere in which the candidate can become an integral part of a smaller team. This position allows for a high degree of freedom as well as the ability to be actively involved in the solutions to a variety of challenging problems.  While the work is rigorous and demands a high level of commitment, the firm maintains an open, cooperative and collegial atmosphere.  Job Responsibilities• Develop quantitative trading strategies using statistical models to capture market inefficiencies• Assist senior strategists in research and management of quantitative strategies• Build algorithms, models, and tools to:  • Facilitate methodologies for portfolio optimization and risk management  • Test hypotheses about markets and simulate trading strategies• Evaluate new methodologies and technologies to improve research and production trading environments, system performance, and functionalities• Generate reports to explain quantitative research results to management and evaluate strategy risk/performance• Maintain technical documentation of procedures, models, and programming work• Operate, troubleshoot, and debug software in a fast-paced environment  Job Qualifications• Experience working with large datasets, statistics, and mathematical computing languages (R, Python, Matlab)• Knowledge of:  • Probability theory, stochastic processes, algorithms, time series analysis, linear algebra, optimization  • Linux, shell scripts  • Design patterns, statistical programming, data management• Excellent design, debugging, and problem solving skills (can analyze and fix problems quickly)• Ability to prioritize multiple tasks and apply cutting-edge technologies in a fast-paced environment• Strong communication skills: can clearly describe technology concepts at both high level (abstract interface) and low level (step-by-step algorithm)• Capable of working independently as well as part of a team• Degree in any of the following: engineering, math/statistics, econometrics, plus but not required

job_qualification: 「新零售」、「全渠道」、「無人店」等，都是零售通路數位轉型的藍圖；人工智慧、機器學習等，則是提升消費體驗，轉型必備的能力，而提供能力的養分則是零售通路的巨量資料、適切的演算法、及懂得探索數據的人才! 遠東集團零售通路體系現下即將進入新營運模式，亟需結集各式大數據人才，協助提出並發現問題、整集並清洗數據、演算並建構數據模型、調整並優化數據參數、輸出結果並提出結論。 大數據團隊預計徵才六位，由零售通路規劃總部帶領，偕同各通路技術團隊，共同建構遠東集團零售通路客戶導向的資料倉儲、數據模型、商情模板，進而提供具客戶體驗導向的數位應用、及人工智慧服務。若是您具備以下相關經驗或資格，我們竭誠歡迎您的加入，為遠東集團零售通路注入新血，共同創造下一個世代、屬於台灣市場的數據零售營運模式!遠東零售集團官網：https://www.ferg.com.tw/categories.aspx?cid=2&lang=TW主要任務：協助與業務端需求確認，執行數據處理、資料分析與報告工作。• 數據專案– 參與營運專案中與數據相關的議題，協助定義數據收集與後續分析需求，規劃並推動數據產品，推動公司朝向數據驅動營運的實現。– 針對分析結果與實際需求單位進行簡報、互動與討論。• 數據分析– 運用BI與database工具進行各種數據維度交叉分析，針對商業問題提出數據產出、評估與應用，並持續優化與修正。– 評估運用合適的統計、機器學習建立模型，探勘商業上可能的關聯/因果，更精準掌握趨勢變化。
job_other_qualification:
其他條件：
個人特質： 1. 邏輯思考、分析判斷、溝通能力佳 2. 喜好主動探索事務或思考、學習新知，且學習能力佳 3. 主動細心、正面思考、工作態度積極 其他條件：– 具會員分群、推薦、預測等演算法理論基礎，並有實作經驗者佳– 具研究報告撰寫、簡報能力

company_name: 竹間智能科技有限公司
job_name: 數據挖掘研發工程師 (Data Mining)
job_qualification: Keywords: machine learning, data mining, deep learning, Hadoop, NoSQL  職位要求： 1. 熟悉大規模數據分析技術，掌握機器學習的相關技術； 在統計(statistics)或機器學習(machine learning)、文本分類或聚類 (text classification and clustering)、海量數據處理、分布式計算(distributed computing)等方面有一定的理論功底和實踐經驗；碩士或博士以上學歷，計算機科學，數學，統計學等相關專業。2. 熟悉數據挖掘相關算法(決策樹-decision tree、SVM、聚類-clustering、邏輯回歸-logistic regression、貝葉斯-Baysian)，有扎實的基本功和良好的邏輯思維能力；對數據敏感，有強烈的好奇心，喜歡折騰數據並從數據中發現價值。 3. 精通數據分析模式，如統計學習理論，貝葉斯統計，算法信息理論，歸納推理等；並且了解它們的強弱之處；有深度CNN (Deep Convolutional Neural Network)和深度RNN (Deep Recursive Neural Network) 經驗優先。 4. 熟悉Java或者Python語言，熟悉SQL和ETL相關流程，熟悉Linux環境及常用命令。

company_name: 91APP_九易宇軒股份有限公司
job_name: Data & Insights Analyst 數據洞察分析師
job_qualification: 工作內容：從產品、銷售等層面建構完整的數據分析體系，並通過數據探索、各案分析等應用，提供產品、營運決策有質量的數據支持。 • 數據專案 – 參與產品專案中與數據相關的議題，協助定義數據收集與後續分析需求，規劃並推動數據產品，推動公司朝向數據驅動營運的實現。• 數據模型 – 依據資料演算與分析需求，建構所需要的資料處理流程與數據模型，根據實際業務調整資料模型與 ETL 流程。• 數據工程 – 能善用自動化的方法處理資料，熟悉大量資料處理與分析，使數據分析與應用產品化。• 數據分析 – 主動進行各種數據追蹤和分析，針對商業問題提出數據產出、評估與應用，並持續優化與修正。建立全面、準確的經營管理成效衡量指標，幫助電商洞察經營數據，提供有效的決策支援。
job_other_qualification:
其他條件：
1.熟悉資料庫、資料處理相關技術概念，如：ER-Model, SQL language, Stored Procedure, ETL Process。2.具備資料統計或程式開發等相關技術，R, Python 等程式語言尤佳。3.熟悉分群、推薦、預測等演算法理論基礎，並有實作經驗。4.主動學習、探索新技術、新領域、新方法，並能快速運用於工作中。

company_name: Dcard _狄卡科技股份有限公司
job_qualification: 過去數年，Dcard 逐漸成長為一個每⽉有八百萬不重複訪客的新世代社群服務。我們致力於打造一個讓每個人都可以放心分享自己故事的地方，提供一個讓分享更⾃由的平台。為了達成這個目標，我們的資料工程師利用統計與機器學習方法，分析使用者產生的內容與閱讀偏好、設計演算法、打造各種資料產品，讓每個人每次打開 Dcard 的時候都能立刻發現⾃己關注的主題。 在 Dcard 你將有機會可以接觸到⼤量⽤戶產生的實際資料，並從中發現改善使用者體驗的關鍵。每天有數以萬計想要分享與閱讀故事的人在 Dcard 上交流，你所製作的產品將能立刻接觸到龐大的使用者，在他們的生活中創造一個美好的驚喜。我們正在尋找喜愛思考與分析使用者需求、動手打造產品的資料工程師，加入我們這個熱愛挑戰的團隊。 【你將有機會參與】 * 改善文章推薦引擎。* 研發熱門主題搜索演算法，製作熱門主題推薦系統。* 協助設計師、前端與後端⼯程師進行介⾯或使用流程的 A/B/n 測試。 【必要條件】 * 曾經學習過統計分析或機器學習相關課程或參與相關專案的經驗。* 熟悉 SQL、Python 或 R。* 熱愛思考使⽤者的需求，將演算法動手打造成產品。* 有良好的溝通能力，能與設計師、⼯程師團隊合作。 【加分條件】 * 有中⽂文字分析的經驗。* 熟悉使用 Python 開發，有設計 API 架構的經驗。* 附上過去相關的專案經驗 【投遞方式】請至：http://grnh.se/1tqdm71投遞履歷，我們會這邊收到的履歷為主。 【注意事項】如果團隊覺得有機會合作，一起讓 Dcard 往更高的目標邁進，我們會儘速聯絡您！ 若不符合的面試者，將不另行通知，謝謝大家。 重複投遞履歷，不會加快您的履歷處理速度喔～

company_name: Style.me_唯衣時尚科技有限公司
job_qualification: The data scientist at Style.me is responsible for the maintenance, improvement, cleaning, and manipulation of data in out business’s operational and analytics databases.The data scientist works with the software engineers at Style.Me in order to understand and aid in the implementation of database requirements, analyze performance, and troubleshoot any existent issues.  We are looking for a Data Scientist that will help us discover the information hidden in vast amounts of data, and help us make smarter decisions to deliver even better products. Your primary focus will be in applying data mining techniques, doing statistical analysis, and building high quality prediction systems integrated with our products.  You are the person with strong business sense along with an ability to communicate findings to both business and IT leaders in a way that can influence how an organization approaches a business challenge.  Responsibilities - Selecting features, building and optimizing classifiers using machine learning techniques - Data mining using state-of-the-art methods - Extending company’s data with third party sources of information when needed - Enhancing data collection procedures to include information that is relevant for building analytic systems - Processing, cleansing, and verifying the integrity of data used for analysis - Doing ad-hoc analysis and presenting results in a clear manner - Creating automated anomaly detection systems and constant tracking of its performance
job_other_qualification:
其他條件：
Requirement: - Excellent understanding of machine learning techniques and algorithms, such as k-NN, Naive Bayes, SVM, Decision Forests, etc. - Experience with common data science toolkits, such as R, Weka, NumPy, MatLab, etc.Excellence in at least one of these is highly desirable - Great communication skills - Experience with data visualisation tools, such as D3.js, GGplot, etc. - Proficiency in using query languages such as SQL, Hive, Pig - Experience with NoSQL databases, such as MongoDB, Cassandra, HBase - Good applied statistics skills, such as distributions, statistical testing, regression, etc. - Good scripting and programming skills - Data-oriented personality

company_name: 捷思遊戲科技有限公司
job_qualification: Summary of role and responsibilitiesAs a Data Scientist you will be a member of the Business Intelligence team, responsible for discovering the information hidden in vast amounts of data, and help us make smarter decisions to deliver even better content. Your primary focus will be in applying data mining techniques, doing statistical analysis, and building high quality prediction systems integrated with our products. In addition to advanced analytic skills, this role is also proficient at integrating and preparing large, varied datasets, architecting specialized database and computing environments, and communicating results. Responsibilities• Designs experiments, test hypotheses, and build models• Conducts advanced data analysis and highly complex designs algorithm.• Applies advanced statistical and predictive modeling techniques to build, maintain, and improve on multiple real-time decision systems.• Employ sophisticated analytics programs, machine learning and statistical methods to prepare data for use in predictive and prescriptive modeling• Selecting features, building and optimizing classifiers using machine learning techniques• Data mining using state-of-the-art methods, such as automate scoring using machine learning techniques, build recommendation systems, improve and extend the features used by our existing classifier, develop internal A/B testing procedures, build system for automated fraud detection• Extending company’s data with third party sources of information when needed• Enhancing data collection procedures to include information that is relevant for building analytic systems• Processing, cleansing, and verifying the integrity of data used for analysis• Creating automated anomaly detection systems and constant tracking of its performance• Conduct undirected research and frame open-ended industry questions• Extract huge volumes of data from multiple internal and external sources• Thoroughly clean and prune data to discard irrelevant information• Devise data-driven solutions to the most pressing challenges• Invent new algorithms to solve problems and build new tools to automate work• Communicate predictions and findings to management and IT departments through effective data visualizations and reports• Being involved in recruitment of new team members
job_other_qualification:
其他條件：
Requirements• Masters in mathematics, statistics or computer science or related field; PHD degree preferred.• Typically requires 5 or more years of relevant quantitative and qualitative research and analytics experience.• Solid knowledge of statistical techniques and machine learning algorithms• Experience with common data science toolkits and statistical packages, such as R, NumPy, MatLab, etc. • The ability to come up with solutions to loosely defined business problems by leveraging pattern detection over potentially large datasets.•• Strong scripting and programming skills (such as Hadoop MapReduce or other big data frameworks, Java), statistical modeling (like SAS or R).• Proficiency in using query languages such as SQL, Hive, Pig• Proficiency in statistical analysis, quantitative analytics, forecasting/predictive analytics, multivariate testing, and optimization algorithms.• Strong communication and interpersonal skills• Experience leading teams• Excellent understanding of machine learning techniques and algorithms, such as k-NN, Naive Bayes, SVM, Decision Forests, etc.• Great communication skills• Experience with data visualization tools, such as Tableau, Splunk, etc.• Experience with NoSQL databases, such as Cassandra, MongoDB • Data-oriented personality

company_name: IBM_台灣國際商業機器股份有限公司
job_qualification: Are you interested in helping companies re-invent themselves and their industries in the digital era? Do you want to leverage your business acumen and understanding of emerging technology to define the vision and strategy for how businesses will remain competitive and grow? Do you have an entrepreneurial and innovative mindset? IBM is recruiting young and talented graduates for IBM’s world-class 2-year development program - Consulting by Degrees Program (CbD). CbD Program is designed by IBM senior experts that aiming to develop future leadership with the opportunity to accelerate consulting career through various client project work across different industries and service areas with focused training, project rotation and mentoring. What the role involves?Data Scientist will work on a variety of research and development projectsleveraging multiple analytical techniques (data mining, text mining, and deep learning ). Scope of projects will include Marketing, Merchandising, Customer Analytics, and Image/Video Recognition. Familiarity with large structured, semi-structured, and unstructured data is a plus. Responsibilities include collaborating with a global Data Science team to develop and implement methodologies; collaborating with solution leaders and engineers to ensure understanding of analytical requirements; ensuring that all algorithms scale and if needed can be executed in real time; engaging with customers to understand their business problems. Your profileWe are looking for entry level candidates from all backgrounds to become full-time Consulting by Degrees consultant, who are keen to demonstrate the following qualities and behaviors:-• Adaptability - How do you cope with changing demands and stress? Are you flexible? Have you successfully completed several projects with competing deadlines?• Communication - Do you present information clearly, precisely and succinctly? Adapt the way you communicate to your audience? And listen to others?• Client Focus - Can you see a situation from a client’s viewpoint, whether that’s colleagues or customers? Can you anticipate their needs?• Creative Problem Solving - Do you use ingenuity, supported by logical methods and analysis, to propose solutions? Can you anticipate problems? Do you put forward innovative ideas?• Drive - Will you proactively learn new skills – even if they’re beyond the scope of your current job? Will you put in the time and energy needed to achieve results?• Teamwork - How do you work with others to achieve shared goals? Do you easily build relationships with others? Are you a team player?• Passion for IBM - Do you know what IBM does and what our most recent achievements are? Are you up to speed with the latest trends in our industry? What are the biggest challenges we face? (You’ll need the facts at your fingertips and the enthusiasm to match.)• Taking Ownership - Do you take responsibility for tasks/decisions? And implement decisions with speed? Can you show when you’ve worked to correct your mistakes?
job_other_qualification:
其他條件：
Required:- No more than 2 years (full-time) relevant work experience- Bachelor's Degree in Computer science or Mathematics, Physics or Statistics.- Basic knowledge of statistical concepts such as regression, time series, mixed model, Bayesian methods, clustering, etc., to analyze data and provide insights. - Basic understanding of programming language for analytics such as R, Python, Matlab, Scala.- Fluent in English Preferred- Experience with large scale real world problems on data science- Experience with deep learning modeling, such as CNN, RNN, LSTM and frameworks regarding TensorFlow, Keras- Demonstrated collaboration and communication skills; comfortable speakingwith both scientific and business audiences at all levels of an organization

company_name: (遠東集團)鼎鼎企業管理顧問股份有限公司
job_name: Data & Insight Analyst (資料洞察分析師)
job_qualification: 「新零售」、「全渠道」、「無人店」等，都是零售通路數位轉型的藍圖；人工智慧、機器學習等，則是提升消費體驗，轉型必備的能力，而提供能力的養分則是零售通路的巨量資料、適切的演算法、及懂得探索數據的人才! 遠東集團零售通路體系現下即將進入新營運模式，亟需結集各式大數據人才，協助提出並發現問題、整集並清洗數據、演算並建構數據模型、調整並優化數據參數、輸出結果並提出結論。 大數據團隊預計徵才六位，由零售通路規劃總部帶領，偕同各通路技術團隊，共同建構遠東集團零售通路客戶導向的資料倉儲、數據模型、商情模板，進而提供具客戶體驗導向的數位應用、及人工智慧服務。若是您具備以下相關經驗或資格，我們竭誠歡迎您的加入，為遠東集團零售通路注入新血，共同創造下一個世代、屬於台灣市場的數據零售營運模式!遠東零售集團官網：https://www.ferg.com.tw/categories.aspx?cid=2&lang=TW主要任務：協助與業務端需求確認，執行數據處理、資料分析與報告工作。• 數據專案– 參與營運專案中與數據相關的議題，協助定義數據收集與後續分析需求，規劃並推動數據產品，推動公司朝向數據驅動營運的實現。– 針對分析結果與實際需求單位進行簡報、互動與討論。• 數據分析– 運用BI與database工具進行各種數據維度交叉分析，針對商業問題提出數據產出、評估與應用，並持續優化與修正。– 評估運用合適的統計、機器學習建立模型，探勘商業上可能的關聯/因果，更精準掌握趨勢變化。

個人特質： 1. 邏輯思考、分析判斷、溝通能力佳 2. 喜好主動探索事務或思考、學習新知，且學習能力佳 3. 主動細心、正面思考、工作態度積極 其他條件：– 具會員分群、推薦、預測等演算法理論基礎，並有實作經驗者佳– 具研究報告撰寫、簡報能力

job_qualification: Keywords: machine learning, data mining, deep learning, Hadoop, NoSQL  職位要求： 1. 熟悉大規模數據分析技術，掌握機器學習的相關技術； 在統計(statistics)或機器學習(machine learning)、文本分類或聚類 (text classification and clustering)、海量數據處理、分布式計算(distributed computing)等方面有一定的理論功底和實踐經驗；碩士或博士以上學歷，計算機科學，數學，統計學等相關專業。2. 熟悉數據挖掘相關算法(決策樹-decision tree、SVM、聚類-clustering、邏輯回歸-logistic regression、貝葉斯-Baysian)，有扎實的基本功和良好的邏輯思維能力；對數據敏感，有強烈的好奇心，喜歡折騰數據並從數據中發現價值。 3. 精通數據分析模式，如統計學習理論，貝葉斯統計，算法信息理論，歸納推理等；並且了解它們的強弱之處；有深度CNN (Deep Convolutional Neural Network)和深度RNN (Deep Recursive Neural Network) 經驗優先。 4. 熟悉Java或者Python語言，熟悉SQL和ETL相關流程，熟悉Linux環境及常用命令。
job_other_qualification:
其他條件：
未填寫

company_name: 91APP_九易宇軒股份有限公司
job_name: Data & Insights Analyst 數據洞察分析師
job_qualification: 工作內容：從產品、銷售等層面建構完整的數據分析體系，並通過數據探索、各案分析等應用，提供產品、營運決策有質量的數據支持。 • 數據專案 – 參與產品專案中與數據相關的議題，協助定義數據收集與後續分析需求，規劃並推動數據產品，推動公司朝向數據驅動營運的實現。• 數據模型 – 依據資料演算與分析需求，建構所需要的資料處理流程與數據模型，根據實際業務調整資料模型與 ETL 流程。• 數據工程 – 能善用自動化的方法處理資料，熟悉大量資料處理與分析，使數據分析與應用產品化。• 數據分析 – 主動進行各種數據追蹤和分析，針對商業問題提出數據產出、評估與應用，並持續優化與修正。建立全面、準確的經營管理成效衡量指標，幫助電商洞察經營數據，提供有效的決策支援。
job_other_qualification:
其他條件：
1.熟悉資料庫、資料處理相關技術概念，如：ER-Model, SQL language, Stored Procedure, ETL Process。2.具備資料統計或程式開發等相關技術，R, Python 等程式語言尤佳。3.熟悉分群、推薦、預測等演算法理論基礎，並有實作經驗。4.主動學習、探索新技術、新領域、新方法，並能快速運用於工作中。

company_name: (遠東集團)鼎鼎企業管理顧問股份有限公司
job_qualification: 「新零售」、「全渠道」、「無人店」等，都是零售通路數位轉型的藍圖；人工智慧、機器學習等，則是提升消費體驗，轉型必備的能力，而提供能力的養分則是零售通路的巨量資料、適切的演算法、及懂得探索數據的人才!  遠東集團零售通路體系現下即將進入新營運模式，亟需結集各式大數據人才，協助提出並發現問題、整集並清洗數據、演算並建構數據模型、調整並優化數據參數、輸出結果並提出結論。 大數據團隊預計徵才六位，由零售通路規劃總部帶領，偕同各通路技術團隊，共同建構遠東集團零售通路客戶導向的資料倉儲、數據模型、商情模板，進而提供具客戶體驗導向的數位應用、及人工智慧服務。 若是您具備以下相關經驗或資格，我們竭誠歡迎您的加入，為遠東集團零售通路注入新血，共同創造下一個世代、屬於台灣市場的數據零售營運模式!    數據分析師: 三年以上消費性商品產業相關之數據分析經驗。統計、應數相關學歷、熟悉至少一種商業智慧工具。熟悉R軟體，具建模經驗者尤佳。主要負責資料探勘、資料分析、資料視覺化；或預測分析、商業決策解讀。(相關徵才細節請參照下列說明) 遠東零售集團官網：https://www.ferg.com.tw/categories.aspx?cid=2&lang=TW 透過收集業務端需求及商業資料，發掘並驗證新的因果/相關與可能解決方案，提供洞見，數據處理、分析與報告。– 與各公司之業務主管溝通– 跨軟體/資料結構及分析/營運發展– 從營運洞察中發掘創新點子– 持續和業務單位成員腦力激盪及互動– 持續發掘尚未蒐集的資料來源及可能性

Linux 基本操作2. 基本資料庫指令概念3. 基本程式能力(C/C++, Java, Python, PHP, Javascript, R, Spark任一皆可)4.     樂於團隊合作及共同分享技術新知。 5.     喜歡嘗試新技術，並能思考如何應用在現行專案中。  工作內容主要使用工具：ELK, Hadoop, Nagios(本公司提供完整教育訓練)- 建置Nagios Log Server, ELK及大數據分析專案。- 可協助整合性專案作業進行。- 可協助客製化產品開發。 * 犯錯沒關係，成長才是最重要的(不過事不過三哦~)。 * 我們是個年輕的團隊(絕對不是一言堂!)，期望在互相討論及自由的管理方式下，建立每個員工與公司最佳的合作模式，互相成長。 * 聯瞻有堅強專業技術及行銷團隊作為後盾，提供創新獨特全方位資訊顧問服務；基於目前的產品，我們也期望激發出更多創意，運用公司資源建立出更多符合客戶需求的產品。 * 我們深知沒有技術背景的PM會為RD造成多大的困擾，因此本公司提供全方位的訓練；我們重視技術人才的培養與未來發展，讓工程師不僅能增進專業技術能力，從生動的簡報製作到、客戶訪談及專案管控的過程中，都有辦法獨當一面。
job_other_qualification:
其他條件：
*熟悉Hadoop、Spark或Elasticsearch者 佳*具備Open Source開發經驗者 佳*具有資料探勘、統計分析、機器學習等相關經驗 佳

company_name: (遠東集團)鼎鼎企業管理顧問股份有限公司
job_qualification: 「新零售」、「全渠道」、「無人店」等，都是零售通路數位轉型的藍圖；人工智慧、機器學習等，則是提升消費體驗，轉型必備的能力，而提供能力的養分則是零售通路的巨量資料、適切的演算法、及懂得探索數據的人才!  遠東集團零售通路體系現下即將進入新營運模式，亟需結集各式大數據人才，協助提出並發現問題、整集並清洗數據、演算並建構數據模型、調整並優化數據參數、輸出結果並提出結論。 大數據團隊預計徵才六位，由零售通路規劃總部帶領，偕同各通路技術團隊，共同建構遠東集團零售通路客戶導向的資料倉儲、數據模型、商情模板，進而提供具客戶體驗導向的數位應用、及人工智慧服務。 若是您具備以下相關經驗或資格，我們竭誠歡迎您的加入，為遠東集團零售通路注入新血，共同創造下一個世代、屬於台灣市場的數據零售營運模式!    數據分析師: 三年以上消費性商品產業相關之數據分析經驗。統計、應數相關學歷、熟悉至少一種商業智慧工具。熟悉R軟體，具建模經驗者尤佳。主要負責資料探勘、資料分析、資料視覺化；或預測分析、商業決策解讀。(相關徵才細節請參照下列說明) 遠東零售集團官網：https://www.ferg.com.tw/categories.aspx?cid=2&lang=TW 透過收集業務端需求及商業資料，發掘並驗證新的因果/相關與可能解決方案，提供洞見，數據處理、分析與報告。– 與各公司之業務主管溝通– 跨軟體/資料結構及分析/營運發展– 從營運洞察中發掘創新點子– 持續和業務單位成員腦力激盪及互動– 持續發掘尚未蒐集的資料來源及可能性

company_name: (遠東集團)鼎鼎企業管理顧問股份有限公司
job_name: Data & Insight Analyst (資料洞察分析師)
job_qualification: 「新零售」、「全渠道」、「無人店」等，都是零售通路數位轉型的藍圖；人工智慧、機器學習等，則是提升消費體驗，轉型必備的能力，而提供能力的養分則是零售通路的巨量資料、適切的演算法、及懂得探索數據的人才! 遠東集團零售通路體系現下即將進入新營運模式，亟需結集各式大數據人才，協助提出並發現問題、整集並清洗數據、演算並建構數據模型、調整並優化數據參數、輸出結果並提出結論。 大數據團隊預計徵才六位，由零售通路規劃總部帶領，偕同各通路技術團隊，共同建構遠東集團零售通路客戶導向的資料倉儲、數據模型、商情模板，進而提供具客戶體驗導向的數位應用、及人工智慧服務。若是您具備以下相關經驗或資格，我們竭誠歡迎您的加入，為遠東集團零售通路注入新血，共同創造下一個世代、屬於台灣市場的數據零售營運模式!遠東零售集團官網：https://www.ferg.com.tw/categories.aspx?cid=2&lang=TW主要任務：協助與業務端需求確認，執行數據處理、資料分析與報告工作。• 數據專案– 參與營運專案中與數據相關的議題，協助定義數據收集與後續分析需求，規劃並推動數據產品，推動公司朝向數據驅動營運的實現。– 針對分析結果與實際需求單位進行簡報、互動與討論。• 數據分析– 運用BI與database工具進行各種數據維度交叉分析，針對商業問題提出數據產出、評估與應用，並持續優化與修正。– 評估運用合適的統計、機器學習建立模型，探勘商業上可能的關聯/因果，更精準掌握趨勢變化。
job_other_qualification:

個人特質： 1. 邏輯思考、分析判斷、溝通能力佳 2. 喜好主動探索事務或思考、學習新知，且學習能力佳 3. 主動細心、正面思考、工作態度積極 其他條件：– 具會員分群、推薦、預測等演算法理論基礎，並有實作經驗者佳– 具研究報告撰寫、簡報能力

job_qualification: 「新零售」、「全渠道」、「無人店」等，都是零售通路數位轉型的藍圖；人工智慧、機器學習等，則是提升消費體驗，轉型必備的能力，而提供能力的養分則是零售通路的巨量資料、適切的演算法、及懂得探索數據的人才! 遠東集團零售通路體系現下即將進入新營運模式，亟需結集各式大數據人才，協助提出並發現問題、整集並清洗數據、演算並建構數據模型、調整並優化數據參數、輸出結果並提出結論。 大數據團隊預計徵才六位，由零售通路規劃總部帶領，偕同各通路技術團隊，共同建構遠東集團零售通路客戶導向的資料倉儲、數據模型、商情模板，進而提供具客戶體驗導向的數位應用、及人工智慧服務。若是您具備以下相關經驗或資格，我們竭誠歡迎您的加入，為遠東集團零售通路注入新血，共同創造下一個世代、屬於台灣市場的數據零售營運模式!遠東零售集團官網：https://www.ferg.com.tw/categories.aspx?cid=2&lang=TW主要任務：協助與業務端需求確認，執行數據處理、資料分析與報告工作。• 數據專案– 參與營運專案中與數據相關的議題，協助定義數據收集與後續分析需求，規劃並推動數據產品，推動公司朝向數據驅動營運的實現。– 針對分析結果與實際需求單位進行簡報、互動與討論。• 數據分析– 運用BI與database工具進行各種數據維度交叉分析，針對商業問題提出數據產出、評估與應用，並持續優化與修正。– 評估運用合適的統計、機器學習建立模型，探勘商業上可能的關聯/因果，更精準掌握趨勢變化。

job_qualification: POSITION OVERVIEWGenesis Gaming is seeking an exceptional ETL developer to normalize and cleanse our massive dataset of gaming service, maintenance and repair data into data analytics tools to assists players in the gaming and to support the design and development of BI Solutions. The ETL Developer will work in conjunction with the ETL Architect, ETL developers and BI developers to understand functionality, scalability, performance, security and integration requirements from the ETL perspective, and translate these requirements into infrastructure resource planning and implementation. This person will be focused on the development and maintenance of the AWS Service Suite of products. KEY ACCOUNTABILITY AREAS- Design, develop data transformations using ELT and ETL approach, and modify and test software applications for BI Data models- Provide mappings from proprietary data sets to industry standard data sets to allow data to be shared in common nomenclature- Translate business requirements into detailed data requirements by performing source data profiling and requirement analysis- Become an expert on our datasets working with cross-functional team members of our industry-leading software packages to identify and prioritize actionable, high-impact insights across a variety of core business areas- Responsible for maintenance, configuration, migration and support Information Server environments and its components- Day to Day management of metadata assets including construction / maintenance of data lineage- Metadata repository tool administration, including routine trouble-shooting, user permission roles and security maintenance, performance monitoring and usage monitoring- Document and establish process and ETL technical runbooks for production support

company_name: 捷思遊戲科技有限公司
job_qualification: Summary of role and responsibilitiesAs a Data Scientist you will be a member of the Business Intelligence team, responsible for discovering the information hidden in vast amounts of data, and help us make smarter decisions to deliver even better content. Your primary focus will be in applying data mining techniques, doing statistical analysis, and building high quality prediction systems integrated with our products. In addition to advanced analytic skills, this role is also proficient at integrating and preparing large, varied datasets, architecting specialized database and computing environments, and communicating results. Responsibilities• Designs experiments, test hypotheses, and build models• Conducts advanced data analysis and highly complex designs algorithm.• Applies advanced statistical and predictive modeling techniques to build, maintain, and improve on multiple real-time decision systems.• Employ sophisticated analytics programs, machine learning and statistical methods to prepare data for use in predictive and prescriptive modeling• Selecting features, building and optimizing classifiers using machine learning techniques• Data mining using state-of-the-art methods, such as automate scoring using machine learning techniques, build recommendation systems, improve and extend the features used by our existing classifier, develop internal A/B testing procedures, build system for automated fraud detection• Extending company’s data with third party sources of information when needed• Enhancing data collection procedures to include information that is relevant for building analytic systems• Processing, cleansing, and verifying the integrity of data used for analysis• Creating automated anomaly detection systems and constant tracking of its performance• Conduct undirected research and frame open-ended industry questions• Extract huge volumes of data from multiple internal and external sources• Thoroughly clean and prune data to discard irrelevant information• Devise data-driven solutions to the most pressing challenges• Invent new algorithms to solve problems and build new tools to automate work• Communicate predictions and findings to management and IT departments through effective data visualizations and reports• Being involved in recruitment of new team members
job_other_qualification:
其他條件：
Requirements• Masters in mathematics, statistics or computer science or related field; PHD degree preferred.• Typically requires 5 or more years of relevant quantitative and qualitative research and analytics experience.• Solid knowledge of statistical techniques and machine learning algorithms• Experience with common data science toolkits and statistical packages, such as R, NumPy, MatLab, etc. • The ability to come up with solutions to loosely defined business problems by leveraging pattern detection over potentially large datasets.•• Strong scripting and programming skills (such as Hadoop MapReduce or other big data frameworks, Java), statistical modeling (like SAS or R).• Proficiency in using query languages such as SQL, Hive, Pig• Proficiency in statistical analysis, quantitative analytics, forecasting/predictive analytics, multivariate testing, and optimization algorithms.• Strong communication and interpersonal skills• Experience leading teams• Excellent understanding of machine learning techniques and algorithms, such as k-NN, Naive Bayes, SVM, Decision Forests, etc.• Great communication skills• Experience with data visualization tools, such as Tableau, Splunk, etc.• Experience with NoSQL databases, such as Cassandra, MongoDB • Data-oriented personality

company_name: IBM_台灣國際商業機器股份有限公司
job_qualification: Are you interested in helping companies re-invent themselves and their industries in the digital era? Do you want to leverage your business acumen and understanding of emerging technology to define the vision and strategy for how businesses will remain competitive and grow? Do you have an entrepreneurial and innovative mindset? IBM is recruiting young and talented graduates for IBM’s world-class 2-year development program - Consulting by Degrees Program (CbD). CbD Program is designed by IBM senior experts that aiming to develop future leadership with the opportunity to accelerate consulting career through various client project work across different industries and service areas with focused training, project rotation and mentoring. What the role involves?Data Scientist will work on a variety of research and development projectsleveraging multiple analytical techniques (data mining, text mining, and deep learning ). Scope of projects will include Marketing, Merchandising, Customer Analytics, and Image/Video Recognition. Familiarity with large structured, semi-structured, and unstructured data is a plus. Responsibilities include collaborating with a global Data Science team to develop and implement methodologies; collaborating with solution leaders and engineers to ensure understanding of analytical requirements; ensuring that all algorithms scale and if needed can be executed in real time; engaging with customers to understand their business problems. Your profileWe are looking for entry level candidates from all backgrounds to become full-time Consulting by Degrees consultant, who are keen to demonstrate the following qualities and behaviors:-• Adaptability - How do you cope with changing demands and stress? Are you flexible? Have you successfully completed several projects with competing deadlines?• Communication - Do you present information clearly, precisely and succinctly? Adapt the way you communicate to your audience? And listen to others?• Client Focus - Can you see a situation from a client’s viewpoint, whether that’s colleagues or customers? Can you anticipate their needs?• Creative Problem Solving - Do you use ingenuity, supported by logical methods and analysis, to propose solutions? Can you anticipate problems? Do you put forward innovative ideas?• Drive - Will you proactively learn new skills – even if they’re beyond the scope of your current job? Will you put in the time and energy needed to achieve results?• Teamwork - How do you work with others to achieve shared goals? Do you easily build relationships with others? Are you a team player?• Passion for IBM - Do you know what IBM does and what our most recent achievements are? Are you up to speed with the latest trends in our industry? What are the biggest challenges we face? (You’ll need the facts at your fingertips and the enthusiasm to match.)• Taking Ownership - Do you take responsibility for tasks/decisions? And implement decisions with speed? Can you show when you’ve worked to correct your mistakes?

job_qualification: Job Title: Data Scientist / Quantitative ResearcherCompany: HLX TechnologyCompensation: up to 2.3 million TWD per year, depending on experienceLocation: 台北市忠孝東路五段68號 (國泰置地/信義微風樓上)  Company Overview HLX Technology (“HLX”) is a quantitative research and technology firm. HLX develops advanced mathematical models and innovative technology solutions to analyze global financial markets. Its founders have extensive experience in the financial industry and advanced degrees in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics from the world's leading universities. We are currently seeking talented, articulate, highly-motivated candidates who will contribute to the design, development, and maintenance of automated trading systems, quantitative research tools, high-performance data management systems, portfolio management tools, and technical architecture/infrastructure.The responsibilities of new hires will span a wide variety of programming, data analysis, statistical and other quantitative projects. These projects often range in duration and programming environment. This position will have a high degree of autonomy as well as responsibility in the design, direction, and approach in these tasks. We believe in a casual and collaborative atmosphere in which the candidate can become an integral part of a smaller team. This position allows for a high degree of freedom as well as the ability to be actively involved in the solutions to a variety of challenging problems.  While the work is rigorous and demands a high level of commitment, the firm maintains an open, cooperative and collegial atmosphere.  Job Responsibilities• Develop quantitative trading strategies using statistical models to capture market inefficiencies• Assist senior strategists in research and management of quantitative strategies• Build algorithms, models, and tools to:  • Facilitate quantitative research and production trading  • Analyze/manage large data sets to improve profitability  • Evaluate and optimize trading strategies and signals  • Implement quantitative methodologies for portfolio optimization and risk management  • Test hypotheses about markets and simulate trading strategies• Evaluate new methodologies and technologies to improve research and production trading environments, system performance, and functionalities• Generate reports to explain quantitative research results to management and evaluate strategy risk/performance• Maintain technical documentation of procedures, models, and programming work• Operate, troubleshoot, and debug software in a fast-paced environment  Job Qualifications• Experience working with large datasets, statistics, and mathematical computing languages (R, Python, Matlab)• Knowledge of:  • Probability theory, stochastic processes, algorithms, time series analysis, linear algebra, optimization  • Linux, shell scripts  • Design patterns, statistical programming, data management• Excellent design, debugging, and problem solving skills (can analyze and fix problems quickly)• Ability to prioritize multiple tasks and apply cutting-edge technologies in a fast-paced environment• Strong communication skills: can clearly describe technology concepts at both high level (abstract interface) and low level (step-by-step algorithm)• Capable of working independently as well as part of a team• Degree in any of the following: engineering, math/statistics, econometrics, operations research, computer science, or physicsOptional:  • Prior experience in the financial industry and familiarity with the financial markets are not required  • Interest in quantitative trading as demonstrated by coursework, track record, or work experience is a plus but not required  • Familiarity to research principles, backtesting methods, machine learning, and data issues is a plus but not required

job_name: 數據挖掘研發工程師 (Data Mining)
job_qualification: Keywords: machine learning, data mining, deep learning, Hadoop, NoSQL  職位要求： 1. 熟悉大規模數據分析技術，掌握機器學習的相關技術； 在統計(statistics)或機器學習(machine learning)、文本分類或聚類 (text classification and clustering)、海量數據處理、分布式計算(distributed computing)等方面有一定的理論功底和實踐經驗；碩士或博士以上學歷，計算機科學，數學，統計學等相關專業。2. 熟悉數據挖掘相關算法(決策樹-decision tree、SVM、聚類-clustering、邏輯回歸-logistic regression、貝葉斯-Baysian)，有扎實的基本功和良好的邏輯思維能力；對數據敏感，有強烈的好奇心，喜歡折騰數據並從數據中發現價值。 3. 精通數據分析模式，如統計學習理論，貝葉斯統計，算法信息理論，歸納推理等；並且了解它們的強弱之處；有深度CNN (Deep Convolutional Neural Network)和深度RNN (Deep Recursive Neural Network) 經驗優先。 4. 熟悉Java或者Python語言，熟悉SQL和ETL相關流程，熟悉Linux環境及常用命令。

job_qualification: We are looking for an experienced Data Engineer to help build, scale and maintain the critical data warehouse. The Business Intelligence team, under the Infrastructure unit, is responsible for building and maintaining the state-of-the-art ETL infrastructure that makes this data available and accessible to the entire company to make data driven decisions. company_name: 捷思遊戲科技有限公司
job_qualification: Summary of role and responsibilitiesAs a Data Scientist you will be a member of the Business Intelligence team, responsible for discovering the information hidden in vast amounts of data, and help us make smarter decisions to deliver even better content. Your primary focus will be in applying data mining techniques, doing statistical analysis, and building high quality prediction systems integrated with our products. In addition to advanced analytic skills, this role is also proficient at integrating and preparing large, varied datasets, architecting specialized database and computing environments, and communicating results. Responsibilities• Designs experiments, test hypotheses, and build models• Conducts advanced data analysis and highly complex designs algorithm.• Applies advanced statistical and predictive modeling techniques to build, maintain, and improve on multiple real-time decision systems.• Employ sophisticated analytics programs, machine learning and statistical methods to prepare data for use in predictive and prescriptive modeling• Selecting features, building and optimizing classifiers using machine learning techniques• Data mining using state-of-the-art methods, such as automate scoring using machine learning techniques, build recommendation systems, improve and extend the features used by our existing classifier, develop internal A/B testing procedures, build system for automated fraud detection• Extending company’s data with third party sources of information when needed• Enhancing data collection procedures to include information that is relevant for building analytic systems• Processing, cleansing, and verifying the integrity of data used for analysis• Creating automated anomaly detection systems and constant tracking of its performance• Conduct undirected research and frame open-ended industry questions• Extract huge volumes of data from multiple internal and external sources• Thoroughly clean and prune data to discard irrelevant information• Devise data-driven solutions to the most pressing challenges• Invent new algorithms to solve problems and build new tools to automate work• Communicate predictions and findings to management and IT departments through effective data visualizations and reports• Being involved in recruitment of new team members
job_other_qualification:
其他條件：
Requirements• Masters in mathematics, statistics or computer science or related field; PHD degree preferred.• Typically requires 5 or more years of relevant quantitative and qualitative research and analytics experience.• Solid knowledge of statistical techniques and machine learning algorithms• Experience with common data science toolkits and statistical packages, such as R, NumPy, MatLab, etc. • The ability to come up with solutions to loosely defined business problems by leveraging pattern detection over potentially large datasets.•• Strong scripting and programming skills (such as Hadoop MapReduce or other big data frameworks, Java), statistical modeling (like SAS or R).• Proficiency in using query languages such as SQL, Hive, Pig• Proficiency in statistical analysis, quantitative analytics, forecasting/predictive analytics, multivariate testing, and optimization algorithms.• Strong communication and interpersonal skills• Experience leading teams• Excellent understanding of machine learning techniques and algorithms, such as k-NN, Naive Bayes, SVM, Decision Forests, etc.• Great communication skills• Experience with data visualization tools, such as Tableau, Splunk, etc.• Experience with NoSQL databases, such as Cassandra, MongoDB • Data-oriented personality

company_name: 捷思遊戲科技有限公司
job_qualification: POSITION OVERVIEWGenesis Gaming is seeking an exceptional ETL developer to normalize and cleanse our massive dataset of gaming service, maintenance and repair data into data analytics tools to assists players in the gaming and to support the design and development of BI Solutions. The ETL Developer will work in conjunction with the ETL Architect, ETL developers and BI developers to understand functionality, scalability, performance, security and integration requirements from the ETL perspective, and translate these requirements into infrastructure resource planning and implementation. This person will be focused on the development and maintenance of the AWS Service Suite of products. KEY ACCOUNTABILITY AREAS- Design, develop data transformations using ELT and ETL approach, and modify and test software applications for BI Data models- Provide mappings from proprietary data sets to industry standard data sets to allow data to be shared in common nomenclature- Translate business requirements into detailed data requirements by performing source data profiling and requirement analysis- Become an expert on our datasets working with cross-functional team members of our industry-leading software packages to identify and prioritize actionable, high-impact insights across a variety of core business areas- Responsible for maintenance, configuration, migration and support Information Server environments and its components- Day to Day management of metadata assets including construction / maintenance of data lineage- Metadata repository tool administration, including routine trouble-shooting, user permission roles and security maintenance, performance monitoring and usage monitoring- Document and establish process and ETL technical runbooks for production support
job_other_qualification:
其他條件：
Required Qualifications- Bachelors or equivalent degree in a business, technical, or related field- Demonstrated Strong SQL Server, Hadoop, Data Warehouse, ETL Design and Development Expertise- At least 3 years of experience with Data Warehouse ETL design, development and maintenance with successful implementation of Enterprise BI solutions- Experience in Hadoop data lake (AWS S3/Redshift/EMR) as source for data cleansing and transformation into data warehouse environment is preferred- Strong technical experience in designing and implementing data-intensive Data Warehouse solutions- High proficiency writing SQL- Strong Knowledge of logical and physical data modeling (relational, dimensional data modeling)

company_name: Style.me_唯衣時尚科技有限公司
job_qualification: The data scientist at Style.me is responsible for the maintenance, improvement, cleaning, and manipulation of data in out business’s operational and analytics databases.The data scientist works with the software engineers at Style.Me in order to understand and aid in the implementation of database requirements, analyze performance, and troubleshoot any existent issues.  We are looking for a Data Scientist that will help us discover the information hidden in vast amounts of data, and help us make smarter decisions to deliver even better products. Your primary focus will be in applying data mining techniques, doing statistical analysis, and building high quality prediction systems integrated with our products.  You are the person with strong business sense along with an ability to communicate findings to both business and IT leaders in a way that can influence how an organization approaches a business challenge.  Responsibilities - Selecting features, building and optimizing classifiers using machine learning techniques - Data mining using state-of-the-art methods - Extending company’s data with third party sources of information when needed - Enhancing data collection procedures to include information that is relevant for building analytic systems - Processing, cleansing, and verifying the integrity of data used for analysis - Doing ad-hoc analysis and presenting results in a clear manner - Creating automated anomaly detection systems and constant tracking of its performance
job_other_qualification:
其他條件：
Requirement: - Excellent understanding of machine learning techniques and algorithms, such as k-NN, Naive Bayes, SVM, Decision Forests, etc. - Experience with common data science toolkits, such as R, Weka, NumPy, MatLab, etc.Excellence in at least one of these is highly desirable - Great communication skills - Experience with data visualisation tools, such as D3.js, GGplot, etc. - Proficiency in using query languages such as SQL, Hive, Pig - Experience with NoSQL databases, such as MongoDB, Cassandra, HBase - Good applied statistics skills, such as distributions, statistical testing, regression, etc. - Good scripting and programming skills - Data-oriented personality

Data Researchers/Analysts are responsible for translating data into meaningful interpretations and valuable recommendations, and develop reports and presentations for cross-functional stakeholders, including product development teams, marketing researchers and technical support groups to harness real world solutions. •  Study and apply data mining, machine learning, data visualization to provide business insights or resolve the problems of cyber threats.•  Identify, analyze, and interpret patterns, or relationship in complex data sets and provide ongoing reports.•  Work closely with management to prioritize business and information needs that lead to actionable insights.[Challenge/Achievement/Growth] • Data Researcher(Analyst)需要深入市場和使用者，快速掌握市場動態與反應，熟悉產品狀況，與資料使用者直接溝通，釐清需求，依據資料分析結果給予下一步產品設計或行銷的建議，扮演開發團隊的顧問角色。 • Data Researcher(Analyst)在提供產品設計概念的階段扮演重要角色，分析產品發展方向、評估策略營運方向和專案經理密切討論產品開發概念，進而累積市場行銷相關知識，奠定未來成為產品分析師或專案經理的基礎。[Related Team/Project/Product]• Core Tech – SPN team (Smart Protection Network)• Consumer – WSE (Web Service Engineering) Backend Team• Commercial –SaaS Platform Team

company_name: IBM_台灣國際商業機器股份有限公司
job_qualification: Are you interested in helping companies re-invent themselves and their industries in the digital era? Do you want to leverage your business acumen and understanding of emerging technology to define the vision and strategy for how businesses will remain competitive and grow? Do you have an entrepreneurial and innovative mindset? IBM is recruiting young and talented graduates for IBM’s world-class 2-year development program - Consulting by Degrees Program (CbD). CbD Program is designed by IBM senior experts that aiming to develop future leadership with the opportunity to accelerate consulting career through various client project work across different industries and service areas with focused training, project rotation and mentoring. What the role involves?Data Scientist will work on a variety of research and development projectsleveraging multiple analytical techniques (data mining, text mining, and deep learning ). Scope of projects will include Marketing, Merchandising, Customer Analytics, and Image/Video Recognition. Familiarity with large structured, semi-structured, and unstructured data is a plus. Responsibilities include collaborating with a global Data Science team to develop and implement methodologies; collaborating with solution leaders and engineers to ensure understanding of analytical requirements; ensuring that all algorithms scale and if needed can be executed in real time; engaging with customers to understand their business problems. Your profileWe are looking for entry level candidates from all backgrounds to become full-time Consulting by Degrees consultant, who are keen to demonstrate the following qualities and behaviors:-• Adaptability - How do you cope with changing demands and stress? Are you flexible? Have you successfully completed several projects with competing deadlines?• Communication - Do you present information clearly, precisely and succinctly? Adapt the way you communicate to your audience? And listen to others?• Client Focus - Can you see a situation from a client’s viewpoint, whether that’s colleagues or customers? Can you anticipate their needs?• Creative Problem Solving - Do you use ingenuity, supported by logical methods and analysis, to propose solutions? Can you anticipate problems? Do you put forward innovative ideas?• Drive - Will you proactively learn new skills – even if they’re beyond the scope of your current job? Will you put in the time and energy needed to achieve results?• Teamwork - How do you work with others to achieve shared goals? Do you easily build relationships with others? Are you a team player?• Passion for IBM - Do you know what IBM does and what our most recent achievements are? Are you up to speed with the latest trends in our industry? What are the biggest challenges we face? (You’ll need the facts at your fingertips and the enthusiasm to match.)• Taking Ownership - Do you take responsibility for tasks/decisions? And implement decisions with speed? Can you show when you’ve worked to correct your mistakes?
job_other_qualification:
其他條件：
Required:- No more than 2 years (full-time) relevant work experience- Bachelor's Degree in Computer science or Mathematics, Physics or Statistics.- Basic knowledge of statistical concepts such as regression, time series, mixed model, Bayesian methods, clustering, etc., to analyze data and provide insights. - Basic understanding of programming language for analytics such as R, Python, Matlab, Scala.- Fluent in English Preferred- Experience with large scale real world problems on data science- Experience with deep learning modeling, such as CNN, RNN, LSTM and frameworks regarding TensorFlow, Keras- Demonstrated collaboration and communication skills; comfortable speakingwith both scientific and business audiences at all levels of an organization

company_name: (遠東集團)鼎鼎企業管理顧問股份有限公司
job_qualification: 「新零售」、「全渠道」、「無人店」等，都是零售通路數位轉型的藍圖；人工智慧、機器學習等，則是提升消費體驗，轉型必備的能力，而提供能力的養分則是零售通路的巨量資料、適切的演算法、及懂得探索數據的人才!  遠東集團零售通路體系現下即將進入新營運模式，亟需結集各式大數據人才，協助提出並發現問題、整集並清洗數據、演算並建構數據模型、調整並優化數據參數、輸出結果並提出結論。 大數據團隊預計徵才六位，由零售通路規劃總部帶領，偕同各通路技術團隊，共同建構遠東集團零售通路客戶導向的資料倉儲、數據模型、商情模板，進而提供具客戶體驗導向的數位應用、及人工智慧服務。 若是您具備以下相關經驗或資格，我們竭誠歡迎您的加入，為遠東集團零售通路注入新血，共同創造下一個世代、屬於台灣市場的數據零售營運模式! 資料工程師: 兩年以上消費性商品產業相關之數據工程經驗。資工相關學歷、熟悉至少一種關係數據庫，具數據挖掘、數據倉儲建立與管理經驗。熟悉大數據技術、伺服器架構經驗者尤佳。主要負責資料蒐集、整頓、自動化及倉儲。(相關徵才細節請參照說明) 遠東零售集團官網：https://www.ferg.com.tw/categories.aspx?cid=2&lang=TW 規劃和實施數據挖掘機制，支持業務單位洞悉數據，提高運營效率/收入及正確的策略規劃與決策判斷管理和領導大數據/數據分析相關項目，以實現專案目標

company_name: 洪量科技有限公司
job_qualification: Job Title: Data Scientist / Quantitative ResearcherCompany: HLX TechnologyCompensation: up to 2.3 million TWD per year, depending on experienceLocation: 台北市忠孝東路五段68號 (國泰置地/信義微風樓上)  Company Overview HLX Technology (“HLX”) is a quantitative research and technology firm. HLX develops advanced mathematical models and innovative technology solutions to analyze global financial markets. Its founders have extensive experience in the financial industry and advanced degrees in science, technology, engineering, and mathematics from the world's leading universities. We are currently seeking talented, articulate, highly-motivated candidates who will contribute to the design, development, and maintenance of automated trading systems, quantitative research tools, high-performance data management systems, portfolio management tools, and technical architecture/infrastructure.The responsibilities of new hires will span a wide variety of programming, data analysis, statistical and other quantitative projects. These projects often range in duration and programming environment. This position will have a high degree of autonomy as well as responsibility in the design, direction, and approach in these tasks. We believe in a casual and collaborative atmosphere in which the candidate can become an integral part of a smaller team. This position allows for a high degree of freedom as well as the ability to be actively involved in the solutions to a variety of challenging problems.  While the work is rigorous and demands a high level of commitment, the firm maintains an open, cooperative and collegial atmosphere.  Job Responsibilities• Develop quantitative trading strategies using statistical models to capture market inefficiencies• Assist senior strategists in research and management of quantitative strategies• Build algorithms, models, and tools to:  • Facilitate quantitative research and production trading  • Analyze/manage large data sets to improve profitability  • Evaluate and optimize trading strategies and signals  • Implement quantitative methodologies for portfolio optimization and risk management  • Test hypotheses about markets and simulate trading strategies• Evaluate new methodologies and technologies to improve research and production trading environments, system performance, and functionalities• Generate reports to explain quantitative research results to management and evaluate strategy risk/performance• Maintain technical documentation of procedures, models, and programming work• Operate, troubleshoot, and debug software in a fast-paced environment  Job Qualifications• Experience working with large datasets, statistics, and mathematical computing languages (R, Python, Matlab)• Knowledge of:  • Probability theory, stochastic processes, algorithms, time series analysis, linear algebra, optimization  • Linux, shell scripts  • Design patterns, statistical programming, data management• Excellent design, debugging, and problem solving skills (can analyze and fix problems quickly)• Ability to prioritize multiple tasks and apply cutting-edge technologies in a fast-paced environment• Strong communication skills: can clearly describe technology concepts at both high level (abstract interface) and low level (step-by-step algorithm)• Capable of working independently as well as part of a team• Degree in any of the following: engineering, math/statistics, econometrics, operations research, computer science, or physicsOptional:  • Prior experience in the financial industry and familiarity with the financial markets are not required  • Interest in quantitative trading as demonstrated by coursework, track record, or work experience is a plus but not required  • Familiarity to research principles, backtesting methods, machine learning, and data issues is a plus but not required

job_name: Data & Insight Analyst (資料洞察分析師)
job_qualification: 「新零售」、「全渠道」、「無人店」等，都是零售通路數位轉型的藍圖；人工智慧、機器學習等，則是提升消費體驗，轉型必備的能力，而提供能力的養分則是零售通路的巨量資料、適切的演算法、及懂得探索數據的人才! 遠東集團零售通路體系現下即將進入新營運模式，亟需結集各式大數據人才，協助提出並發現問題、整集並清洗數據、演算並建構數據模型、調整並優化數據參數、輸出結果並提出結論。 大數據團隊預計徵才六位，由零售通路規劃總部帶領，偕同各通路技術團隊，共同建構遠東集團零售通路客戶導向的資料倉儲、數據模型、商情模板，進而提供具客戶體驗導向的數位應用、及人工智慧服務。若是您具備以下相關經驗或資格，我們竭誠歡迎您的加入，為遠東集團零售通路注入新血，共同創造下一個世代、屬於台灣市場的數據零售營運模式!遠東零售集團官網：https://www.ferg.com.tw/categories.aspx?cid=2&lang=TW主要任務：協助與業務端需求確認，執行數據處理、資料分析與報告工作。• 數據專案– 參與營運專案中與數據相關的議題，協助定義數據收集與後續分析需求，規劃並推動數據產品，推動公司朝向數據驅動營運的實現。– 針對分析結果與實際需求單位進行簡報、互動與討論。• 數據分析– 運用BI與database工具進行各種數據維度交叉分析，針對商業問題提出數據產出、評估與應用，並持續優化與修正。– 評估運用合適的統計、機器學習建立模型，探勘商業上可能的關聯/因果，更精準掌握趨勢變化。

job_name: Data & Insights Analyst 數據洞察分析師
job_qualification: 工作內容：從產品、銷售等層面建構完整的數據分析體系，並通過數據探索、各案分析等應用，提供產品、營運決策有質量的數據支持。 • 數據專案 – 參與產品專案中與數據相關的議題，協助定義數據收集與後續分析需求，規劃並推動數據產品，推動公司朝向數據驅動營運的實現。• 數據模型 – 依據資料演算與分析需求，建構所需要的資料處理流程與數據模型，根據實際業務調整資料模型與 ETL 流程。• 數據工程 – 能善用自動化的方法處理資料，熟悉大量資料處理與分析，使數據分析與應用產品化。• 數據分析 – 主動進行各種數據追蹤和分析，針對商業問題提出數據產出、評估與應用，並持續優化與修正。建立全面、準確的經營管理成效衡量指標，幫助電商洞察經營數據，提供有效的決策支援。

company_name: (遠東集團)鼎鼎企業管理顧問股份有限公司
job_qualification: 「新零售」、「全渠道」、「無人店」等，都是零售通路數位轉型的藍圖；人工智慧、機器學習等，則是提升消費體驗，轉型必備的能力，而提供能力的養分則是零售通路的巨量資料、適切的演算法、及懂得探索數據的人才!  遠東集團零售通路體系現下即將進入新營運模式，亟需結集各式大數據人才，協助提出並發現問題、整集並清洗數據、演算並建構數據模型、調整並優化數據參數、輸出結果並提出結論。 大數據團隊預計徵才六位，由零售通路規劃總部帶領，偕同各通路技術團隊，共同建構遠東集團零售通路客戶導向的資料倉儲、數據模型、商情模板，進而提供具客戶體驗導向的數位應用、及人工智慧服務。 若是您具備以下相關經驗或資格，我們竭誠歡迎您的加入，為遠東集團零售通路注入新血，共同創造下一個世代、屬於台灣市場的數據零售營運模式!    數據分析師: 三年以上消費性商品產業相關之數據分析經驗。統計、應數相關學歷、熟悉至少一種商業智慧工具。熟悉R軟體，具建模經驗者尤佳。主要負責資料探勘、資料分析、資料視覺化；或預測分析、商業決策解讀。(相關徵才細節請參照下列說明) 遠東零售集團官網：https://www.ferg.com.tw/categories.aspx?cid=2&lang=TW 透過收集業務端需求及商業資料，發掘並驗證新的因果/相關與可能解決方案，提供洞見，數據處理、分析與報告。– 與各公司之業務主管溝通– 跨軟體/資料結構及分析/營運發展– 從營運洞察中發掘創新點子– 持續和業務單位成員腦力激盪及互動– 持續發掘尚未蒐集的資料來源及可能性

company_name: Shopline Limited_商線科技有限公司
job_qualification: Shopline, a fully funded, 500 Startups Accelerator company, is looking for a passionate and talented Software Engineer​ to join our team in Taiwan. You’ll be a part of an engineering team that is dedicated to developing a reliable and robust commerce platform for merchants in Asia. At SHOPLINE we are working on very intenteresting initiatives that would involve using data-mining and machine learning. with the vast amount of data that we currently have and growing exponentially. We will share details during the interview.   【What you’ll be doing】1. Develop, operate, and monitor ETL for data collection, cleansing, processing, storage, and analytics2. Develop data visualization to track data usage, server status, and represent data insights3. Automate data process tasks and support data analysis tasks4. Use existing algorithms and implement data-mining strategies to achieve our end goal. 【What Are we looking for?】1. At least 2 years of experience in building and operating large scale distributed systems or applications2. At least 2 years of experience in processing data with Python (scikit-learn), Scala, or R3. Familiar with Hadoop ecosystem, such as Spark, Hive, Hue, Pig4. Experience with implementing highly scalable systems on top of cloud infrastructures, such as AWS or GCP5. Expertise in Linux/Unix environments and familiar with shell scripting6. Expertise in hands-on ETL job design, components and modules development of data process7. Great communication skill and can-do attitude8. Desired skills: Python (scikit-learn), Scala, Hadoop, Hive, Spark, Linux/Unix, AWS, MySQL/Mongo/PostgreSQL, R
job_other_qualification:
其他條件：
Data mining and machine learning algorithm experience is a big plus

job_name: 營運資料分析或數據工程師
job_qualification: 利明顧問的團隊，主要協助美洲及歐洲客戶確認其大中華地區的商業夥伴是否遵守智慧財產合約的規範。 綜合資料分析及產業知識，協助控制其國際客戶多樣化的企業風險和提升客戶的企業利益。如果你是個有正義感且經常喜歡探討你所接觸事務的科技業精英，這個職位也許適合你。主要工作內容：• 資料/數據分析 -  依據需求，設計資料分析程式和模組，取出可供驗證的資訊; 利用Excel, Access, or SQL 集聚控制資訊並快速地辨識及報告差異• 營運和產品分析 – 產品相關技術調查和營運數據統計分析• 市場分析 – 產業市場、競爭者動態及客戶需求情報蒐集與調查研究專案規劃• 方案追蹤工作條件：• 熟悉SQL語言或其它程式語言做海量資料分析• 對SAP、ORACLE 或其他ERP系統及財務套裝軟體有經驗者尤佳• 具資訊收集與報表處理相關經驗• 熟悉電子產業者佳• 數字分析能力佳• 須精通Excel （或 Access)• 需不定時在中國、香港、台灣、東南亞出差人格特質：具領導特質、溝通協調能力、數理邏輯思考組織觀念、數字分析力。對數字靈敏、主動積極、細心沉穩、學習力強、具組織、執行、整合能力、企圖心、抗壓性高，必要時能配合加班或外地出差、積極凡事正面思考。

job_qualification: 以下說明為此職缺的工作內容，但如果您技術經驗尚未成熟但對新技術充滿熱忱，期待全方位的成長；而不是單純坐在辦公室Coding及跟PM吵架，做小螺絲釘的工作；歡迎您跟我們聯絡。 基本技術要求1. Linux 基本操作2. 基本資料庫指令概念3. 基本程式能力(C/C++, Java, Python, PHP, Javascript, R, Spark任一皆可)4.     樂於團隊合作及共同分享技術新知。 5.     喜歡嘗試新技術，並能思考如何應用在現行專案中。  工作內容主要使用工具：ELK, Hadoop, Nagios(本公司提供完整教育訓練)- 建置Nagios Log Server, ELK及大數據分析專案。- 可協助整合性專案作業進行。- 可協助客製化產品開發。 * 犯錯沒關係，成長才是最重要的(不過事不過三哦~)。 * 我們是個年輕的團隊(絕對不是一言堂!)，期望在互相討論及自由的管理方式下，建立每個員工與公司最佳的合作模式，互相成長。 * 聯瞻有堅強專業技術及行銷團隊作為後盾，提供創新獨特全方位資訊顧問服務；基於目前的產品，我們也期望激發出更多創意，運用公司資源建立出更多符合客戶需求的產品。 * 我們深知沒有技術背景的PM會為RD造成多大的困擾，因此本公司提供全方位的訓練；我們重視技術人才的培養與未來發展，讓工程師不僅能增進專業技術能力，從生動的簡報製作到、客戶訪談及專案管控的過程中，都有辦法獨當一面。

company_name: Style.me_唯衣時尚科技有限公司
job_qualification: The data scientist at Style.me is responsible for the maintenance, improvement, cleaning, and manipulation of data in out business’s operational and analytics databases.The data scientist works with the software engineers at Style.Me in order to understand and aid in the implementation of database requirements, analyze performance, and troubleshoot any existent issues.  We are looking for a Data Scientist that will help us discover the information hidden in vast amounts of data, and help us make smarter decisions to deliver even better products. Your primary focus will be in applying data mining techniques, doing statistical analysis, and building high quality prediction systems integrated with our products.  You are the person with strong business sense along with an ability to communicate findings to both business and IT leaders in a way that can influence how an organization approaches a business challenge.  Responsibilities - Selecting features, building and optimizing classifiers using machine learning techniques - Data mining using state-of-the-art methods - Extending company’s data with third party sources of information when needed - Enhancing data collection procedures to include information that is relevant for building analytic systems - Processing, cleansing, and verifying the integrity of data used for analysis - Doing ad-hoc analysis and presenting results in a clear manner - Creating automated anomaly detection systems and constant tracking of its performance

Requirement: - Excellent understanding of machine learning techniques and algorithms, such as k-NN, Naive Bayes, SVM, Decision Forests, etc. - Experience with common data science toolkits, such as R, Weka, NumPy, MatLab, etc.Excellence in at least one of these is highly desirable - Great communication skills - Experience with data visualisation tools, such as D3.js, GGplot, etc. - Proficiency in using query languages such as SQL, Hive, Pig - Experience with NoSQL databases, such as MongoDB, Cassandra, HBase - Good applied statistics skills, such as distributions, statistical testing, regression, etc. - Good scripting and programming skills - Data-oriented personality

job_qualification: Summary of role and responsibilitiesAs a Data Scientist you will be a member of the Business Intelligence team, responsible for discovering the information hidden in vast amounts of data, and help us make smarter decisions to deliver even better content. Your primary focus will be in applying data mining techniques, doing statistical analysis, and building high quality prediction systems integrated with our products. In addition to advanced analytic skills, this role is also proficient at integrating and preparing large, varied datasets, architecting specialized database and computing environments, and communicating results. Responsibilities• Designs experiments, test hypotheses, and build models• Conducts advanced data analysis and highly complex designs algorithm.• Applies advanced statistical and predictive modeling techniques to build, maintain, and improve on multiple real-time decision systems.• Employ sophisticated analytics programs, machine learning and statistical methods to prepare data for use in predictive and prescriptive modeling• Selecting features, building and optimizing classifiers using machine learning techniques• Data mining using state-of-the-art methods, such as automate scoring using machine learning techniques, build recommendation systems, improve and extend the features used by our existing classifier, develop internal A/B testing procedures, build system for automated fraud detection• Extending company’s data with third party sources of information when needed• Enhancing data collection procedures to include information that is relevant for building analytic systems• Processing, cleansing, and verifying the integrity of data used for analysis• Creating automated anomaly detection systems and constant tracking of its performance• Conduct undirected research and frame open-ended industry questions• Extract huge volumes of data from multiple internal and external sources• Thoroughly clean and prune data to discard irrelevant information• Devise data-driven solutions to the most pressing challenges• Invent new algorithms to solve problems and build new tools to automate work• Communicate predictions and findings to management and IT departments through effective data visualizations and reports• Being involved in recruitment of new team members
